summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 62nd Street from 40th Avenue Northeast to 43rd Avenue Northeast; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17957 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
